BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: COLLEGE AUXILIARY SERVICES OF THE STATE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE STUDENT AND FACULTY SERVICES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION IS ESTABLISHED TO OPERATE, MANAGE, AND PROMOTE EDUCATIONAL SERVICES FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE STATE UNIVERSITY COLLEGE AT PLATTSBURGH'S CAMPUS COMMUNITY WHICH INCLUDES FACULTY, STAFF, STUDENTS, THE COLLEGE COUNCIL, AND ALUMNI IN HARMONY WITH THE EDUCATIONAL MISSION AND PUBLIC SERVICE GOALS OF THE COLLEGE.
IRS990.Desc: COLLEGE FOOD SERVICE - PROVIDES CAMPUS DINING PROGRAM AND CATERING SERVICES TO THE STUDENTS, FACULTY AND STAFF OF SUNY PLATTSBURGH.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COLLEGE STORE - SUPPLIES TEXTBOOKS, MERCHANDISE AND CONVENIENCE STORE ITEMS TO THE STUDENTS, FACULTY AND STAFF OF SUNY PLATTSBURGH.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: OTHER STUDENT/STAFF/FACULTY SERVICES - OPERATES CAMPUS SHUTTLE, COORDINATES VACATION BUSING, MANAGES CAMPUS ID CARD PROGRAM, CONTRACTS FOR RESIDENT HALL LAUNDRY SERVICES. COORDINATES CONFERENCES AND EVENTS. MANAGES EVENT SPACE AND LODGING ROOMS.

ContractorCompensationGrp.ServicesDesc: COLLEGE STORE AND CONVENIENCE STORE OPER

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: BE COOL HEATING AND AIR CONDITIONING

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AGENCY FUNDS ARE HELD BY THE CORPORATION IN A CUSTODIAL OR FISCAL AGENT CAPACITY FOR THE BENEFIT OF STUDENTS, FACULTY, STAFF MEMBERS, OR APPROPRIATELY RECOGNIZED ORGANIZATIONS AND ARE NOT FUNDS OF THE CORPORATION.
THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS THE BUDGETS OF ITS GRANTEES, WHICH INCLUDE BOARD APPROVAL. THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS ALL RECORDS TO SUBSTAINTIATE THESE GRANTS.
DURING 2022 THOMAS ZELLAR RECEIVED SERVERANCE PAYMENT FROM THE ORGANIZATION IN THE AMOUNT OF $3,577.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD TREASURER, EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, AND CONTROLLER. THE CONTROLLER AGREES ALL FIGURES TO THE ORGANIZATION'S AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FINAL FORM 990 IS THEN CIRCULATED TO THE BOARD WHO APPROVES THE FORM AT THE NEXT MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION ESTABLISHED A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IN FISCAL 2015. ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES WILL BE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE UPDATED CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE PUT ON FILE IN THE COLLEGE LIBRARY. THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND INTERNAL POLICIES ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEAR.
